sentences.en: ...the 236 revolutionary prisoners whose names are listed herewith.
sentences.cn: ...这236名革命囚犯的名单附在本材料中。

sentences.en: A list of the names of the contributors is enclosed herewith.
sentences.cn: 随信附上捐款人的名单.

sentences.en: A set of samples is enclosed herewith.
Enclosed herewith is a twenty - fen stamp.
For the payments I inclose herewith P . O . money order.
sentences.cn: 为支付货款,同函附上邮局汇票.

sentences.en: Herewith we are sending you a written contract under seal in two copies.
sentences.cn: 兹寄上盖有印章的契约一式两份.

sentences.en: I am sending you herewith a cheque.
I enclose herewith a cheque for 10 pounds.
sentences.cn: 随信附上十镑支票一张.

sentences.en: I enclose herewith a cheque for 20 pounds.
sentences.cn: 随信附上二十镑支票一张.

sentences.en: I enclose herewith a copy of the policy.
sentences.cn: 我随信附上一份保险单。

sentences.en: I send you herewith two copies of the contract.
sentences.cn: 我随函附上合同一式两份.

sentences.en: Please find two samples enclosed herewith.
We send you herewith two copies of the contract.
sentences.cn: 我们随函附上合同一式两份.

trans.tran_en: Herewith means with this document, text, or book. You can use herewith in a letter to say that you are enclosing something with it.
